caption.p: Selection of wheat breeding lines showing optima combination of days to heading and plant height in Diyarbakir (DIY SEL) for 2 years (“U1275-1-4-2-2/KS85W663-7-4-2//JAGGER” accession number, ACCN# 30961), in Konya (KON SEL) for 3 years (“MADSEN/TAM-202//TX89V4138,” ACCN# 40662), and in Maragheh (MAR SEL) for 3 years (“WO405D/HGF112//W7469C/HCF012,” ACCN# 70546) and across all environments (ALL SEL) and years (“TAM 105/3/NE70654/BBY//BOW“S”/4/Century ∗3/TA2450”ACC# 70554). Functional genes present (1) and absent (0) are shown. DHAVG, PHAVG, GYAVG: days to heading (DHAVG), plant height (PHAVG), and grain yield (GYAVG) average across all environments and years.
Click here for additional data file.
